name: soundcloud_bulk_search
description: Search multiple queries on SoundCloud in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling soundcloud_search multiple times - it is faster and more efficient. Pass all queries as a single comma-separated string.

parameters.name: queries
parameters.description: Comma-separated search queries (e.g. 'lo-fi beats,indie rock,electronic music')

detailSteps.code: const results = []; const items = document.querySelectorAll('.searchList__item, [class*="soundList__item"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(items.length, 5); i++) { const el = items[i]; const titleEl = el.querySelector('.soundTitle__title span, a[class*="soundTitle"] span'); const artistEl = el.querySelector('.soundTitle__username, a[class*="soundTitle__username"]'); const playsEl = el.querySelector('[class*="playbackCount"], [title*="plays"]'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('a[class*="soundTitle__title"]'); results.push({ title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : '', artist: artistEl ? artistEl.textContent.trim() : '', plays: playsEl ? playsEl.textContent.trim() : '', url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '' }); } const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { query: params.get('q') || '', result_count: results.length, results: results }
detailSteps.name: search_results
detailSteps.label: Extract results
